dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT TO_CHAR(SAIL_DATE), SHIPMENT_XID AS SHIPMENT_NUMBER, CREDIT_NUMBER, CONTAINER_COUNTANDDETAIL, VESSEL, CONTRACT_NUMBER, TO_CHAR(MT_WEIGHT_NUMONLY) MT_WEIGHT_NUMONLY, COMMODITY_DETAIL, NOTIFY_PARTY FROM VIEW_SHIPMENT_SUMMARY VSS WHERE SHIPMENT_GID = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT NVL(TO_CHAR(SAIL_DATE),'Data Missing in System') SAIL_DATE, 'TBD' AS SHIPMENT_NUMBER, NVL(CREDIT_NUMBER, 'Data Missing in System') CREDIT_NUMBER, NVL(CONTAINER_COUNTANDDETAIL, 'Data Missing in System') CONTAINER_COUNTANDDETAIL, NVL(VESSEL, 'Data Missing in System') VESSEL, NVL(CONTRACT_NUMBER, 'Data Missing in System') CONTRACT_NUMBER, NVL(TO_CHAR(MT_WEIGHT_NUMONLY), 'Data Missing in System') MT_WEIGHT_NUMONLY, NVL(COMMODITY_DETAIL, 'Data Missing in System') COMMODITY_DETAIL, NVL(NOTIFY_PARTY, 'Data Missing in System') NOTIFY_PARTY FROM VIEW_SHIPMENT_SUMMARY VSS WHERE SHIPMENT_GID = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'
